items.title: School Founded
items.summary: King's College Murcia opens its doors to the first cohort.
items.details: Launch with a commitment to academic excellence and global citizenship.

items.title: Eco Patrol Starts
items.summary: Primary students introduce recycling monitors across classrooms.
items.details: A student-led patrol designed signage, managed recycling points, and reported metrics to assemblies.

items.title: STEM Lab Expansion
items.summary: New labs with makerspace equipment open for KS3.
items.details: The expansion added collaborative benches, rapid prototyping tools, and an analytics corner shared with IB students.

items.title: Global Cultural Fair
items.summary: Families hosted 18 country booths with performances and food.
items.details: Proceeds funded service trips and a micro-library for partner schools in Murcia.

items.title: 1:1 Digital Learning Rollout
items.summary: Tablets introduced with blended learning coaching.
items.details: Teachers co-designed digital notebooks and analytics dashboards for formative assessment.

items.title: Solar Awareness Week
items.summary: Student-led campaign on renewable energy and savings.
items.details: Workshops, poster sessions, and classroom energy audits.

items.title: IB Diploma Authorisation
items.summary: First IB Diploma cohort begins with global politics focus.
items.details: Faculty exchanges with King's College London supported the launch and vertical articulation.

items.title: Green Roof Garden
items.summary: Students cultivate Mediterranean herbs on the library roof.
items.details: Hydroponic beds capture rainwater and sensors feed a real-time dashboard in science labs.

items.title: Coding & Robotics Showcase
items.summary: Year 7-9 teams demo prototypes for the Inspired Global Summit.
items.details: Projects included assistive tech wearables, drone mapping, and wellbeing dashboards.

items.title: Virtual Learning Acceleration
items.summary: 96% daily attendance achieved during hybrid term.
items.details: Analytics-informed calls and wellbeing check-ins kept families connected through lockdown.

items.title: Circular Cafeteria Pilot
items.summary: Compostable trays replaced 12k single-use plastics per term.
items.details: AI scales tracked food waste, informing menu redesign and community challenges.

items.title: Regional Athletics Champions
items.summary: U18 squad brings home double gold.
items.details: Data-informed training loads and recovery pods lifted performance while reducing injuries.

items.title: Energy Dashboard Launch
items.summary: Live solar + HVAC data accessible to science classes.
items.details: Students built custom widgets to compare carbon savings vs. previous baselines.

items.title: Innovation Hub Refit
items.summary: Modular studio hosts CAS incubator, VR cave, and podcast booth.
items.details: Acoustic panels are made from recycled denim donated by families.

items.title: CAS Climate Hackathon
items.summary: Team prototypes energy-saving nudges with alumni mentors.
items.details: Winning concepts linked smart meters to a gamified house system for continuous engagement.
